titleStmt.title: A nevve comedy or enterlude, concernyng thre lawes of nature, Moises, and Christe, corrupted by the sodomytes, Pharysies, and papistes: compyled by Iohn Bale: and nowe newly imprynted.
Comedy concernynge thre lawes
titleStmt.author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: In S. brydes Churchyarde, ouer agaynste the north doore of the churche, by Thomas Colwell],
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our Lord, M,D,LXII, [1562, 6 November]

notesStmt.note: Originally published in 1548(?) as: A comedy concernynge thre lawes.
Printer's name, address, and day of printing from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
